Summary: Took photos of Chevron explosion. Saw no aircraft or birds, no sound. Appeared when downloaded.
divs: Sighting DetailsI was gardening and city emergency siren sounded. Went inside and took 9 photos of Chevron cloud and did not see anything until downloaded. There didn't seem to be helicopters or birds near toxic cloud. Object did not appear in all pics.
